verbose_text: In these rapidly proliferating cells, citrate generated by the tricarboxylic acid cycle is preferentially exported from the mitochondria to the cytosol and then cleaved by ATP citrate lyase (ACLY) to produce cytosolic acetyl coenzyme A, which is the building block for DNL [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: citrate generated by the tricarboxylic acid cycle is preferentially exported from the mitochondria to the cytosol and then cleaved by ATP citrate lyase (ACLY) to produce cytosolic acetyl coenzyme A
